Dialogue: Hey you, what're you standing around for!?
We're preparing for take off and you think this is the time for dilly dallying!?
Yes, I'm talking to you! Who else??
Go get the GPS now! There's not much time!
You have it? Good work officer, give it here!
Calculating route . . . Fuel is at full capacity . . . Engine's are stable . . . Ignition sequence start.
We are ready for launch. Take off in T-minus 10
Wait a minute, what's that sound?
